biz.aduna.map.cluster
Class ClusterMapFactory

java.lang.Object
  biz.aduna.map.cluster.ClusterMapFactory
public abstract class ClusterMapFactory
extends java.lang.Object

A ClusterMapFactory is capable of producing a ClusterMap instance and instances of related classes. ClusterMapFactory has a non-abstract factory method that creates an instance of a default implementation of ClusterMapFactory.

See Also:
ClusterMap, ClusterMapMediator, ClusterMapGUI

Constructor Summary
ClusterMapFactory()
           
 
Method Summary
abstract  ClusterMap createClusterMap()
          Returns a new, empty ClusterMap.
static ClusterMapFactory createFactory()
          Returns a ClusterMapFactory instance that is capable of creating a ClusterMap instance and all related instances.
abstract  ClusterMapGUI createGUI(ClusterMapMediator mediator)
          Returns a ready-to-use GUI for a ClusterMap, using components created and managed by the specified ClusterMapMediator.
abstract  ClusterMapMediator createMediator(ClusterMap map)
          Returns a new ClusterMapMediator that can create and return GUI components that allow an end user to view and adapt the contents of a ClusterMap.
static java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String name)
          Get a property passed to the clustermap library, such as the location of the license file.
static void setProperty(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value)
          Pass a property to the clustermap library, such as the location of the license file.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
